objects.text:
• Digital LED Control Panel
• Multiple Wash Cycles
• Large Front-Loading Capacity
• Energy-Efficient Design

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Innovation
product_details.description:
• Digital LED display with intuitive control panel for easy operation
• Multiple wash cycles including Express, Delay, and Temperature settings
• Large capacity front-loading design for efficient washing
• Energy-efficient operation with customizable water levels
• Sleek white exterior with modern black accent door
• Clear viewing window to monitor wash progress
• Adjustable spin speed options for different fabric types
• Built-in delay start function for convenient scheduling
• Electronic controls with rotary dial selector
• Anti-vibration system with stabilizing feet
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for apartments and homes
• Easy-access detergent and fabric softener dispensers

banner_details:
This promotional banner is divided into a clean quadrant grid with intersecting horizontal and vertical lines, creating four distinct sections. The top-left quadrant features a bold promotional phrase (`heading`) in large uppercase typography on a deep blue background. Below it is a prominent subheadline (`subheading`) highlighting the product type, followed by a yellow callout (`tagline`) emphasizing urgency. The product image (`product_image`) is placed prominently in the top-right, overlapping slightly into adjacent sections for visual balance. In the lower half, the left quadrant details product features (`description`), a large price tag (`price`), and a white rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background` with `cta` text). The lower-right features a bold alert message (`heading_2`) and a smaller urgency note (`subtext`). Subtle geometric shapes and circular highlights add visual interest and depth.  
**Color Palette:**  
- Deep Blue: `#004AAD`  
- Bright Blue: `#2065D3`  
- Vivid Orange: `#FF4500`  
- Light Orange: `#FF6A33`  
- Highlight Yellow: `#FFFF00`  
- Accent White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek washing machine design with a clean, modern approach that heavily relies on a monochromatic color palette accented with metallics and a touch of digital blue. The dominant white (#FFFFFF) establishes a sense of cleanliness and minimalism, while black (#000000) from the drum border and control panel adds contrast and sophistication. Metallic silver (#B0B0B0) highlights the knob, enhancing its premium feel. The blue LED display (#0094FF) introduces a tech-savvy touch, making key functions stand out. These colors blend smoothly with crisp transitions, while each retains distinct visibility, ideal for creating an ad banner that feels clean, modern, and advanced.
